DGtal::CDigitalSet< Domain > Struct Template Reference
[DGtal concepts]

#include <CDigitalSet.h>

Detailed Description

template<typename Domain>
struct DGtal::CDigitalSet< Domain >

Description of concept 'CDigitalSet'

Aim: Represents a set of points within the given domain. This set of points is modifiable by the user.

Refinement of boost::DefaultConstructible, boost::CopyConstructible, boost::Assignable
